alert.note: Alert for Allen; Henry; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Putnam, south central Henry, southeastern Van Wert and Allen Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delphos, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elida around 340 PM EDT. Ottoville around 345 PM EDT. Kalida around 355 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Columbus Grove, Ottawa, Pandora, Glandorf and Leipsic. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 122, and between mile markers 124 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for west central Ohio.
